name: Navkar Steel
overview:
Established in year 1981, we, “Navkar Steel”, are among the prominent organizations engaged in manufacturing and supplying Flanges, Fittings, Olets, Fasteners, Bars, Plates, Pipes and Tubes.

Our Team: We are supported by some of the most qualified and technically sound professionals, who are well aware about different techniques required to manufacture products.

Infrastructure: Our infrastructure is divided into various divisions like manufacturing, R&D, quality control, warehouse, packaging and back end administration.

Why Us: We are a renowned name in this domain engaged in providing various types of SS, CS & AS Products. Owing to our excellent product quality and transparent dealings, we have gained immense clients’ appreciation.

Our Products: Blind Flanges Spade Flanges Weld Neck Flanges Socket Weld Flanges Square Flanges Threaded Flanges RTJ Flanges
